overview: A founding member of Marin Software’s sales organization, Andrew oversees new sales of Marin’s platform to digital agencies. Andrew brings 15 years of senior sales experience to Marin and previously served as a naval officer leading Engineering and Combat Systems divisions in shipboard operations in the Red Sea, Northern Indian Ocean and Persian Gulf. Andrew earned a bachelorâ€™s degree in mathematics with general engineering core curriculum from the U.S. Naval Academy in Annapolis.
